Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey-black in section, the interior is lightly covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a brown slip and remains of four lines of Coptic text written in black ink, writ large.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394730) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394730)
